Description: Header file for SQLite DPI interface

Functions
sqlite_dpi_open_database
sqlite3 *sqlite_dpi_open_database(
const 
char 
*
db_path
)

Opens a SQLite database connection.

Parameters
db_path
const char*

Path to the SQLite database file.

Returns

Pointer to the SQLite database connection, or NULL on failure.

sqlite_dpi_close_database
void sqlite_dpi_close_database(
sqlite3 
*
db
)

Closes a SQLite database connection.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection to close.

Returns

None.

sqlite_dpi_execute_query
int sqlite_dpi_execute_query(
sqlite3 
*
db,
const 
char 
*
query
)

Executes a SQL query on the database.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

query
const char*

SQL query string to execute.

Returns

SQLite result code (SQLITE_OK on success).

Table Operations
Functions
sqlite_dpi_read_schema
int sqlite_dpi_read_schema(
sqlite3 
*
db
)

Reads the database schema.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

Returns

SQLite result code (SQLITE_OK on success).

sqlite_dpi_write_schema
int sqlite_dpi_write_schema(
sqlite3 
*
db,
const 
char 
*
table_name,
const 
char 
*
columns
)

Writes a table schema to the database.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

table_name
const char*

Name of the table.

columns
const char*

Column definitions string.

Returns

SQLite result code (SQLITE_OK on success).

sqlite_dpi_table_exists
int sqlite_dpi_table_exists(
sqlite3 
*
db,
const 
char 
*
table_name
)

Checks if a table exists in the database.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

table_name
const char*

Name of the table to check.

Returns

1 if table exists, 0 if not, negative on error.

sqlite_dpi_insert_row
int sqlite_dpi_insert_row(
sqlite3 
*
db,
const 
char 
*
table_name,
const 
char 
*
columns,
const 
char 
*
values
)

Inserts a row into a table.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

table_name
const char*

Name of the table.

columns
const char*

Column names string.

values
const char*

Values string.

Returns

SQLite result code (SQLITE_OK on success).

int sqlite_dpi_delete_row(
sqlite3 
*
db,
const 
char 
*
table_name,
int 
row_id
)

Deletes a row from a table.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

table_name
const char*

Name of the table.

row_id
int

ID of the row to delete.

Returns

SQLite result code (SQLITE_OK on success).

sqlite_dpi_get_row

sqlite3 
*
db,
const 
char 
*
table_name,
int 
row_id
)

Retrieves a row from a table.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

table_name
const char*

Name of the table.

row_id
int

ID of the row to retrieve.

Returns

SQLite result code (SQLITE_OK on success).

sqlite_dpi_get_rowid_by_column_value
extern int sqlite_dpi_get_rowid_by_column_value(
void* 
db,
const 
char* 
table_name,
const 
char* 
column,
const 
char* 
value
)

Retrieves the first row ID that matches a specific column value.

Parameters
db
void*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

table_name
const char*

Name of the table.

column
const char*

Name of the column to search in.

value
const char*

Value to search for.

Returns

Row ID if found, -1 if not found or on error.

sqlite_dpi_get_cell_value
extern const char* sqlite_dpi_get_cell_value(
void* 
db,
const 
char* 
table_name,
int 
row_id,
const 
char* 
column
)

Retrieves the value of a specific cell from a table.

Parameters
db
void*

The database handle.

table_name
const char*

The name of the table.

row_id
int

The ID of the row.

column
const char*

The name of the column.

Returns

The value of the cell as a string, or NULL on error.

sqlite3 
*
db,
const 
char 
*
table_name,
const 
char 
*
columns
)

Creates a new table in the database.

Parameters
db
sqlite3*

Pointer to the SQLite database connection.

table_name
const char*

Name of the table to create.

columns
const char*

Column definitions string.

Returns

SQLite result code (SQLITE_OK on success).

Returns
